description:
Please Find the Below Job Description:-

Title:- Business Analyst

Client:- Webologix

Location:- Los Angeles, CA

Type:- Contract

Minimum Qualifications

  • Work with all stakeholders including business customers, vendors, and internal resources to facilitate team communication and achieve the mission.
  • Gathers, analyzes, defines, and documents requirements and communicates them to the technical & non-technical audience.
  • Transforms information from elicitation sessions into business requirements and functional requirements, use cases, user stories, and software requirements

specifications documents. Uses standard templates and simple, unambiguous, and concise natural language.

  • Ability to analyze and decompose problem statements, distilling these into clearly defined requirements.
  • Validate data and test applications for business requirements, functionality, and usability.
  • Responsible for carrying out complex analysis of datasets and conducting appropriate data validation Responsible for gathering and validating datasets across multiple data sources.
  • Provide information on analytic results to business and functional leaders using visualizations to communicate data and metrics.
  • Assist with user acceptance testing.
  • Ability to work on multiple projects in parallel and work constructively as part of a team or teams to coordinate with developers and business users to analyze system characteristics.
  • Project coordination: Assist in project planning, scheduling, and monitoring activities. Track project milestones, deliverables, and dependencies to ensure timely completion and adherence to project scope.

Thanks & Regards
